item.description:
Cockaponset State Forest is the second largest in Connecticut. It was named after an Indian chief buried in Haddam. The Cockaponset Trail crosses the forest.

This will be an easy walk with multiple trails to choose from. Social walking pace. We will be out for 2 to 3 hours, or as fate may choose. Afterwards we will have a picnic lunch. Rain cancels. Dogs and children are welcome as long as they are calm and well behaved.

Location: 200 Cedar Lake Rd, Chester, CT.
http://maps.google.co...
